entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023
